node.title: Smog forces closure of New Delhi schools as India pushes for coal compromise at COP26
node.alt: A metro train passes a hospital in heavy smog in Delhi
node.description: Authorities in the Indian capital are discussing a complete shutdown of the city due to extreme levels of air pollution.
node.content:
["Schools in New Delhi will be closed for a week and construction sites for four days\u00a0as authorities try\u00a0to protect people from a worsening air pollution crisis.", "New Delhi Chief Minister\u00a0Arvind Kejriwal said a discussion about\u00a0a potential complete lockdown of the capital was\u00a0also underway, but any decision would only be taken after consultation with the central government.", "Earlier in the day, the chief justice of India asked the central government to come up with an emergency plan to tackle the dangerous smog, calling the situation \"very serious\".", "Air quality in Delhi, often ranked the world's most polluted capital, has declined due to crop stubble burning, emissions from transport, coal-fired plants outside the city and other industry, as well as open garbage burning and dust.", "However at the COP26 climate summit in Glasgow, India was behind a watering down of the the final agreement's wording about coal, altering it to \"phase down\" rather than \"phase out\".", "Several countries said they were deeply disappointed by the change from India,\u00a0the single biggest source of greenhouse gas emissions.", "", "
Private office have been advised to close and have staff work from home.(Reuters: Cathal McNaughton)
", "The Air Quality Index (AQI) in and around Delhi has worsened to 470-499 on a scale of 500, according to federal pollution control board data.", "That level of pollution means the air will affect healthy people and seriously impact those with existing diseases.", "\"For a week from Monday onwards, schools will be physically closed but will continue virtually so that children don't\u00a0have to breathe polluted air \u2026 [and] construction activities [will] not to be allowed,\" Mr Kejriwal said.", "He added all government staff would work from home, while private offices would be advised to do the same for a week to reduce the number of polluting vehicles on the road.", "\"We have been forced to wear masks at home also, the situation is very serious,\" chief justice of India, Nuthalapati Venkata Ramana, the top legal officer in the Supreme Court, said.", "The court was hearing a plea filed by a student over the worsening air quality.", "Mr Ramana said the government should consider a two-day lockdown to protect citizens and also inform the court on Monday about emergency steps to improve air quality.", "", "
Coal community looks to green future as COP26 delegates discuss end of fossil fuel(Daniel Ziffer)
", "Reuters/AP"]
